section.title: SetDnsRecords Method - Atomia DNS API
section.para: Sets the records for all matching label/type/class-triples in a zone to that specified by the records passed.

section.title: Declaration syntax
section.programlisting: void SetDnsRecords( string zonename, [resourcerecord|resourcerecord Datatype - Atomia DNS API][] records )

tr.td: an array of the records to change, id is not used
